attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are an ordinary English family who lived in Amerca for six years.We returned to England aboard the Q.E.2.in 
1974.It was the wow factor of our lives never to be forgotten.

Southampton was broken hearted when we watched the Queen Mary and Elizabeth leave for the last time.

Please Mr Brown don't let this happen to the Q.E.2.she should stay, and be the WOW factor that Southampton council have been looking for.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
